entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Ice pellets at times mixed with freezing rain changing to rain this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow or rain ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 26 March 2023
